meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: COOLEST PARK EVER?

div.a: Can These Guys Really Pull Off An Underground Park In NYC?

div.div: After a successful Kickstarter campaign, the Lowline designers have mocked up their ambitious project to rescue disused infrastructure using NASA-inspired technology.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RvV7Hs&via=Digg&text=Can These Guys Really Pull Off An Underground Park In NYC?

div.div: ARRRR YOU KIDDING ME?

div.a: Obama Celebrates Talk Like A Pirate Day

div.div: In case you were somehow unaware that it's Talk Like A Pirate day, President Obama sent a friendly reminder.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R0Blat&via=Digg&text=Obama Celebrates Talk Like A Pirate Day

div.div: HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
The emoticon is old. Or, young, 30 years young! Either way, it's a bona fide grown-up symbol now, with the life experience under its lack of a belt (for it has no waist) to prove it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S7EtDt&via=Digg&text=The Evolution Of The Emoticon

div.div: HURRY UP AND WAIT

div.a: Defense Department Stalls Out On Addressing Gay Soldiers' Benefits

div.div: One year after the military ended its “Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell” ban on out gay, lesbian, and bisexual service members, the Pentagon has not yet determined whether and how it will adapt regulations and programs to include military same-sex couples and their families.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VdWJtt&via=Digg&text=Defense Department Stalls Out On Addressing Gay Soldiers' Benefits

div.div: THE 48TH PARALLEL

div.a: U.S. Swears It Has No Secret Plan To Invade Canada

div.div: The U.S. and Mexico are not secretly planning to invade Canada, a State Department spokeswoman confirmed to laughter during a daily press briefing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZFv25&via=Digg&text=U.S. Swears It Has No Secret Plan To Invade Canada

div.div: WHO'S HUNGRY?

div.a: Study: A Single Burger Pollutes As Much As An 18-Wheeler Driving 143 Miles

div.div: A study from UC Riverside found that the particulate air pollution from a commercial kitchens (that means pretty much any restaurant, from industrial fast food shithole to adorable café) cooking charbroiled burgers was worse than pollution from diesel trucks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RxXw4u&via=Digg&text=Study: A Single Burger Pollutes As Much As An 18-Wheeler Driving 143 Miles

div.div: SORRY GENESIS
Thanks to a heap of lovely fossils, we now know that even the most fearsome of the tyrant dinosaurs were closely related to the avian dinosaurs—the birds—that flit around our backyards today.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RrEORy&via=Digg&text=Feathered Dinosaurs Drive Creationists Crazy

div.div: A RUBBER MUSCLE SUIT CERTAINLY HELPS

div.a: Identifying With Batman Boosts Dudes' Self-Image

div.div: Batman may be saving more than Gotham City. For throngs of devoted male fans, the muscular superhero may bolster body image too, according to a new study.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S74EKC&via=Digg&text=Identifying With Batman Boosts Dudes' Self-Image

div.div: PERHAPS NOT THE BEST MAPS YET

div.a: Early Reviews Say New Apple Maps Leave A Lot To Be Desired

div.div: Apple’s decision to part ways with Google as a partner and build its own maps app is looking like a bit of a hasty decision right now. The first round of handpicked reviewers have gotten a chance to use the iPhone 5, and though all of them gush about the phone as a whole, the Maps app is the biggest complaint.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UdcAdM&via=Digg&text=Early Reviews Say New Apple Maps Leave A Lot To Be Desired

div.div: CLIMATE CHANGE

div.a: Arctic Sea Ice Stops Melting, But Not Before Setting Record Low

div.div: The drastic melting of Arctic sea ice has finally ended for the year, scientists announced Wednesday, but not before demolishing the previous record — and setting off new warnings about the rapid pace of change in the region.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8iT0d&via=Digg&text=Arctic Sea Ice Stops Melting, But Not Before Setting Record Low

div.div: ENGINEERING THE PERFECT SHOT
A modern gun propels a bullet over ten times further than its 19th century counterpart. What changes allowed this marked improvement in performance?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5Leao&via=Digg&text=The Physics Of Bullets

div.div: FISH ART
Underwater cameras recently discovered the source of these mysterious underwater creations. Who knew the puffer fish was such an artistic creature?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RuhsuA&via=Digg&text=Mysterious Underwater 'Crop Circle' Art Discovered

div.div: ALSO ONE OF THE TEN BEST PHOTOGRAPHERS IN THE WORLD

div.a: Drones, Getaway Cars, And Saving The Planet: Louie Psihoyos Is The Real Life Steve Zissou

div.div: Here's an extensive Q&A with Louie Psihoyos who is essentially the real life Steve Zissou.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OctRCS&via=Digg&text=Drones, Getaway Cars, And Saving The Planet: Louie Psihoyos Is The Real Life Steve Zissou

div.div: APPLE

div.a: Did iOS 6 Mess Up Your WiFi? Here's How To Fix It

div.div: A lot of Apple users have reported problems connecting to WiFi networks after updating to iOS 6. Don't worry, there seems to be an easy fix.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8iagW&via=Digg&text=Did iOS 6 Mess Up Your WiFi? Here's How To Fix It

div.div: BIG MONEY, LITTLE BOTTLES

div.a: The Big Promotional Value Of Miniature Liquor Bottles

div.div: businessweek.com - via @whitneysnyder
"One wine and liquor store owner in Queens, N.Y., says his morning mini [liquor bottle] customers include mailmen, who buy a few for the daily delivery route."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qj8ETo&via=Digg&text=The Big Promotional Value Of Miniature Liquor Bottles

div.div: IN THE NAME OF SCIENCE

div.a: U.S. Explodes Atomic Bombs Near Beers To See If They Are Safe To Drink

div.div: So you're minding your own business when all of a sudden, a nuclear bomb goes off, there's a shock wave, fires all around, general destruction and you, having somehow survived, need a drink. What can you do?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T3GIsJ&via=Digg&text=U.S. Explodes Atomic Bombs Near Beers To See If They Are Safe To Drink

div.div: POLITICS

div.a: A Conservative History Of The United States

div.div: American history as retold in a series of quotes by modern conservatives.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QlOaJO&via=Digg&text=A Conservative History Of The United States

div.div: CAN'T TAKE IT WITH YOU

div.a: Buffett Billionaires Back Medical Marijuana, Museums

div.div: Warren Buffett and Bill and Melinda Gates’s initiative to get billionaires to pledge at least half their wealth to charity signed on 11 new families who support causes from science museums to access to marijuana.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S5yjTa&via=Digg&text=Buffett Billionaires Back Medical Marijuana, Museums

div.div: MILITARY

div.a: 'Insider Attacks' Could Poison U.S. Ops Way Beyond Afghanistan

div.div: Insurgents and terrorists in Yemen, Somalia and beyond owe a a great deal of thanks to the Afghan National Army and Police. Those ostensible U.S. allies just gave U.S. enemies a new strategy for attacking a weak link in the “shadow wars” that define the future of U.S. counterterrorism: Infiltrate the local security forces and kill the American mentors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rum3Nv&via=Digg&text='Insider Attacks' Could Poison U.S. Ops Way Beyond Afghanistan

div.div: FOR SCIENCE
One reporter experienced the highs, lows, and psychedelic purple doors involved in taking MDMA while having his brain scanned.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QlkaQZ&via=Digg&text=My Ecstasy Brain Scan
